channel.title: The MoparMobile
channel.description: I am going to design a MoparIsTheBest car in Forza Motorsport 2. I will start tonight and finish sometime tomorrow. Give some advice on what you want to be on the Mopar car. When I am done I will post a pic here. Also give me something to name it because the MoparMobile sounds extremely gay.

item.title: The MoparMobile
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

Boss Mustang. use it.

Read full topic

item.title: The MoparMobile
item.dc:creator: @Andrew Andrew
item.description:
@Andrew wrote:

Probably from scratch. I have a mental image of what the base will look like. Most likely be based on a
Fairlady Z drifter I have.

Now that I have thought about it I am thinking of basing it on a 1969 Chevy Camaro

Read full topic
